.. Example 1

Loading and plotting airfoils
==============================

This example loads airfoil coordinates from a text file and plots them.

Specifications
--------------

- The airfoil is NACA 2414

Results
-------

The generated plot of the airfoil coordinates is given below.

.. figure:: /../../examples/example_1.png

Code
----

.. literalinclude:: /../../examples/example_1.py
